about_the_game:
Overview


A new mentor is added to the game.

Overseer Winterflood is said to have been responsible for the creation of the HUB system as we know it today, and with this DLC he will be available to help us with our mission. The new Winterflood Rank 7 Union card is added to the game with this DLC and will be available in Mission, Skirmish, and Crisis modes.

A new loading image is also added to game with this DLC and has a 50% chance of being used instead of the normal loading image, and a new main menu image will also be added and has the same 50% chance of being shown.
